review.description: Quick easy tasty avocado chicken salad... Inexpensive and the guys are nice!!! It beats any other fast food joint any day.
review.author: Liz O.

review.description: New owner. Raised prices without changing A thing. I'm.extremely dissatisfied.
review.author: Jonathan L.

review.description: Good bird.  Not greasy.  Get the sweet (dark red) sauce --- it's excellent.  I sometimes tell myself I'm buying a supply of the sauce for $10 and getting free chicken as a bonus.
review.author: Bob K.

review.description: This is your basic grill place. Charcoal broiled chicken,  baby back BBQ ribs, fries-rice-corn-veggies, char-grilled burgers & sandwiches, wings, salads, wraps, sodas. No beer or wine  (yet).  Nothing fancy, everything is somewhat tasty, simple. About 6 tables to seat, the place looks clean for a hole-in-the-wall it is.  The Smoke Joint 3 blocks away would give you more in quality AND quantity in half baby back ribs than this place in whole rack - for less. But here you can get a quarter back ribs, it is inexpensive, so you pay more for a privilege to pay less))
review.author: vlad d.
